# Enhanced Darkvision (Feat)
## Overview
Your darkvision extends further than normal.

**Prerequisites:** Wis 15+, [[Alertness (Feat)|Alertness]], darkvision 60 ft. or more.

**Bonus:** Your darkvision range is doubled. 

**Source:** Feats (AEG), pg. 34
